website_summaries.verdict: Liquid eyeliner enthusiasts who don't want to pay double digits are likely to be impressed with this top-selling formula that applies and wears similarly to premium brands.
pros: Made with coconut and honey, so it goes on smoothly and isn't prone to flaking
Pointed tip makes it easy to draw a thin line, yet it's also buildable for bolder looks
Made for sensitive eyes, so it's less likely than other liquid formulas to cause irritation
cons: Although it wears all day for most consumers, those with very oily skin may find it tends to smudge
Some users report that the tube dries out fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great price and stays on. I’ve tried expensive and cheap eyeliner and after a few hours they smudge and start of raccoon eyes(I also have oily skin and do wing liner). This eyeliner stays on all day which is the first for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi W.

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner I’ve bought in years!  Holds up!
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding. After buying another brand on Amazon and it drying out each time in under two weeks sometimes just a couple days I’m over the moon this works perfect. Makes a nice line and since I have Asian eyes I’m prone to smudging but this holds up!
customer_reviews.author: nayj

customer_reviews.title: Idk how to apply liner
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this is a great product I just have extremely sensitive eyes and took a risk buying this. Product is probably great for people who can normally use eyeliner but it made my eyes swell up - again not due to the product. I’ve yet to find any liner that doesn’t make my eyelids swell.
customer_reviews.author: User739156420

customer_reviews.title: wow !!
customer_reviews.text: best liquid eye liner ever!!! a little hard to remove, but just worth the use. LOVE IT!, and I have tried so many brands!!
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with eyeliner making a smudge line on my upper eyelid. This eyeliner does not do that unless I am seriously sweating. It is great for my day to day. It goes on smooth and easy and I am able to create a thin line with a little wing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, nice dark liner
customer_reviews.text: I bought four different kinds of eyeliner trying to find one that I liked because they stop making the one that I liked, of course (it was a cover girl product). This was the winner.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Perry

customer_reviews.title: Applies easily!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and I have no eye irritation using this product.
customer_reviews.author: D Wright

customer_reviews.title: If you want an eye infection
customer_reviews.text: This caused me to have a massive eye infection resulting in more costs and medication cost to get rid of. I decided to try it out on my hand, no problem but then I tried my eye and since this is the only new thing I've worn it caused a very painful infection
customer_reviews.author: Lily Murray

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great Until It Transfers Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the great reviews and many people saying it was 'smudge proof.' I have oily eyelids (weird but common) and this eyeliner transfers to my crease and brow bone within a couple hours of wear. The result is a black smear above my crease, which is noticeable to others and has prompted a few comments from close friends. I've tried every combination of primers and setting products to keep it from transferring, but no luck. I'm sad though because it goes on really smooth and looks great for the first hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: This is disappointing for this brand...
customer_reviews.text: The one positive aspect is that it truly is hypoallergenic. It does not bother my eyes like soo many other eyeliners do. Having said that, it takes several passes to create a semi-dark line. I would have loved it to be a truly dark black, but it’s not. It almost seems as if the ink is partially dried out. It is also very easy to rub off. If you rub your eyes for any reason it will wipe right off. It is not waterproof. Not. At. All.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner for watery allergy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: If you have bad seasonal allergies and have trouble finding an eyeliner that doesn’t smear and smudge all over your eyes and the rest of your face when your eyes water uncontrollably from your allergies, then you should give this one a try. I’ve tried $30+ name brand liners and have yet to find one that stays put the way this one does all day! Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: OUFAN75

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyeliner. It goes on super easy and stays on. I was in a wedding and the bride saw me use this and actually asked me to use it on her instead of this eyeliner she has (because it looked better!). I ended up using this on her and she loved it. I use it daily and takes me little-to-no time to use. Highly recommend and will be buying again once I use it up. **UPDATE** I have noticed that some of the fibers splinter out occasionally and I have had to cut those pieces off (otherwise I get a random line where I don’t want it). Pretty minor but important to note.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to eyeliner for my day-to-day life. It's easy to apply in a thin, subtle line or in a dramatic sweep. This is the most smudge-proof eyeliner I have found that doesn't irritate my eyes or skin. I have super sensitive skin, but I have no issues with this eyeliner. It does smudge a bit by the end of the day, but I have yet to find a comparable product that does any better. Same goes for being waterproof, I wouldn't say this eyeliner is very water resistant, but it's better than any of the other eyeliners I've tried. For my daily life, it's exactly what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand but SUPER HARD TO APPLY
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed in this eyeliner. I do love that it is neutrogena (good for my skin) but it's so hard to use. The tip is super flimsy- I was hoping for a more firm-like tip. I may just have to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Really stays
customer_reviews.text: Goes on really easily and tip is a good amount of firmness and thinness. Doesn’t flake - at all! Stays on very well but the drawback is that it’s extremely difficult to get all the way off (I use jojoba oil which works well for every other eyeliner I’ve used) - feel like I’m giving myself eye wrinkles trying to get the smudges all the way off the side of my face with this eyeliner
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hintz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last. Not even till lunch. Like, all gone... no smudging I guess, cause it’s just all gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: my eyes are very sensitive so I decided to order this hypoallergenic, smudge proof, long lasting eyeliner. I was so excited when I received this eyeliner, so I tried it as soon as I opened the package. I wore it for 4 hours only, the corner of my eyes were started to get red and felt burning. Plus it was smudging around my eyes, I was sorry that the other areas would get irritated also So I ran to wash it off
customer_reviews.author: kalee Li

customer_reviews.title: Favorite liquid eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to apply this liquid eyeliner. I saw the product at Walmart and decided to try it, and now I buy it on Amazon just to guarantee it's in stock. I also buy my Neutrogena black eyeliner on Amazon so I don't have to worry about the stores being out. I've tried other brands but always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable eyeliner, exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Wayyy better than expected. I usually use Morphe liquid liner, but they were out so I decided to get this thinking it’d tide me over. Definitely worth the price, this personally is my favorite felt tip liner ever. I’ve been using it for weeks and it hasn’t gotten dried out. I’m considering just using this instead of morphe. I don’t think it’s as water proof as morphe but that’s not much of an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sachi Barker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it. Smudges like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I work in an office that is constantly freezing. I was at work for approximately 1 hour and the liner was already smudging. I typically go with KatVonD but wanted to save some money. Certainly won’t do that again.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Tip dries quickly, otherwise good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: It stays on well, but the tip dries quickly. Still better than half the products I’ve tried. I have sensitive eyes, so I can’t use a lot of products. But Neutragena products have only ever caused me once, and that was when I discovered my skin does not like retinol. Which is common. Overall good product, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: not smudge & water resistant
customer_reviews.text: While the eyeliner pen and tip were standard and easy to use, the liquid itself was thin, watery, and not at all smudge-proof or waterproof. Instant racoon eyes on bottom and top lids that I had to repeatedly check myself in the mirror for all day long to correct.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not good for extreme makeup!
customer_reviews.text: There is many better options. I tend to do pretty extreme eyeliner and this did not work for that. It would dry out before I could even finish a single wing and then I would have to wait a few minutes before enough product got in the tip again. I was in a rush one time and accidentally bent the bristles of the eyeliner tip backwards a bit and no matter what I do it simply won't go back to how it was. Not precise at all, would never work for any modern eye looks.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Converted.
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Precise and easy to use. Never going back to pencils. CON. None, unless you don't put the cap on properly. You can damage the bristles or allow it to dry out. SO PUT THE CAP ON RIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: mama'Othree

customer_reviews.title: Dull color , low pigmentation, easy to use but I do not recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: This pen size is perfect for precious stroke . I have to return it because of the formula , the liquid black was not high pigmentations, instead of a dull black that can not intensify your eye line .
customer_reviews.author: Maika

customer_reviews.title: Great product for allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible allergies. My eyes water terribly. I take antihistamines but it wasn’t enough. This has worked the best for me. I like the thinner tip that makes the eye liner not so noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: P K

customer_reviews.title: 1 use only
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I used this once and loved the way it went on and didn’t smudge. BUT when I went to use it again a week later it no longer worked, I guess it dried out. I usually love Neutrogena products but this was a big disappointment ☹️
customer_reviews.author: N.J.

customer_reviews.title: Runs
customer_reviews.text: At first I really like it, but then found when applying it was actually running into my eyes. I though that can't be but tried it again with the same results, I am no longer using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose648

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well it's a "it sure fooled me". Perfect eyeliner and stays on. After 52 years in the music business (tons of stage work), this is probably the best of anything I've used. So a buy again for me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 9

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver coming from a person who gets swollen eyes from other eyeliners
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is extremely comfortable on my eyes, and I do not catch my eyes puffing and swelling up wearing this eyeliner like I do with practically any other eyeliner! This is the eyeliner for you hypoallergenic peeps!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserKK

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is easy to put on, creates a nice, black line- as thick as I want it- and it doesn’t leak formula and get messy. I find it easier to draw a thin line right above my lash line than other brands I’ve used in the past. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hameroff

customer_reviews.title: Stays for Days no Irritation
customer_reviews.text: I will keep buying. Couldn't figure out why my eyelids were swollen and itchy even when I didn't have on liner. Here's the answer make sure it's hypoallergenic and does what it said. Looks great and I tested it I can leave this on for days (not recommended) but if you do it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: makadoblack1967

customer_reviews.title: Smudge-Proof!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is actually smudge proof! I’ve been looking and looking and looking for an eyeliner that won’t melt away on my eyelids in the California 100+ degree summer days and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fine tip, makes it easy to draw a perfect eyeliner! Doesn't smudge easily either, so you don't have to worry about looking like a panda at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: J.U.

customer_reviews.title: True waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best waterproof eyeliner I've ever used! I love to wakeboard and between face-plants & swimming, this eyeliner holds true! Added bonus? It's very inexpensive! Oddly enough, it's not horrible to remove like some brands either.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Precise, smooth, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best eyeliner I've bought, and I've tried many. Note: I like to have very clear "cat eyes." Goes on super smooth and the brush head is super precise.
customer_reviews.author: Luna4x0

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Unless your a fine arts artist and know how to use a paint brush this is not for you. I could not get a straight line in the right place on my eyelid one time, let alone 4 lines each morning. Once on you have to fix quickly because it sets and becomes water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: LFSherry

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay for me. Might be better for you?
customer_reviews.text: Smudge proof but as soon as it gets wet, forget it. It’s an ok liner, but wouldn’t purchase again because I have very watery eyes and oily lids. I’m sure it’ll work well for others though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Fine Eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner that I have ever found that truly creates a very fine line. It is also very easy to touch up a tiny spot that needs more eyeliner. What a lovely surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am hyper allergenic an love love this product. It doesn’t irritate my eye lids an it stays very very easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice true black
customer_reviews.text: It's a true black which I love but it's not as water resistant as I thought from reading other reviews. I would buy again but only if I can't find something that lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Because it Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: This lasted 2 months before it was empty. Doesn't seem like very long for $7.28, but I'm buying it again because I like it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ewers

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I love how well it goes on and how easy it is to use. It takes me literally 2 minutes to put on if not less.
customer_reviews.author: Lizinzi DiLernia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful liner! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Glides on nicely. No transfer marks. Stays put. Really have to massage in the cold cream to remove it. Wonderful eyeliner. I should know I've been wearing eyeliner since 1992 lol.
customer_reviews.author: ASV1979

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sensitive to liquid eyeliner but this one seems to stay longer and doesn’t sting. Easy to apply as well.
customer_reviews.author: VEA

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't step outside of my comfort zone with eyeliner but due to it being hypoallergenic I wanted to give it a shot. I have hooded eyes and due to that reason it smudged pretty bad. My eyelids get pretty warm it didn't last before I got out of the house. I ended up using my 2 dollar liner that stays on all night. Not good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Wont come off until you want it to
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stays on forever!!! But it's still really east to remove once you wash your face. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: taylor perdue

customer_reviews.title: Removes easily
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, looks great and comes off well. I haven’t noticed any smudging after it’s allowed to dry for a few seconds. I love using it!
customer_reviews.author: APN

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Ehh. Wore it once and the product was running alot. Hard to aplly aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Again another eyeliner that claims to be waterproof / smudge proof I don’t think it lasted even 1 hour
customer_reviews.author: sugga

customer_reviews.title: Great dark eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This liner is great! Need to use miceller water to remove as it doesn’t wash off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not apply well...
customer_reviews.text: Does not go on smoothly. You need to shake it while using to keep product flowing, and even then it does not apply well. Tried it instead of the Clinique product I usually use since this was cheaper....I will be going back to Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri up north

customer_reviews.title: Great liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Like the fine tip. When i use this product it doesn't dry too fast. If i make an error Inam able to wipe and re applym
customer_reviews.author: nicky gax

customer_reviews.title: Glides on well, stays on
customer_reviews.text: even after I blend in brown shadow so it's not distinct. Pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this and it is gentle on my sensitive skin. It lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen P

customer_reviews.title: Not "smudge / water resistant"
customer_reviews.text: Quite reasonable price for liquid eyeliner. However, the eyeliners that I spent a little more on defo performed better. This liner is advertised as "smudge proof", though, after about 3-5 hours of wear I do notice that this liquid liner would make its way down my face and a little bit of raccoon eyes do happen. Over all easy to use, and reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Stays on
customer_reviews.text: The majority of liquid eye liners I use tend to smear, or come off, fairly easy. Or if I try a waterproof eye liner then it peels off... this one does neither of those. It stays on and is easy to put on. When you need to take it off it's easy to take off too. I have never tried this brand before and I am happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and precise
customer_reviews.text: Who doesnt want a nice thin Black eye line for there everyday look ?
customer_reviews.author: C. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Not smudge or water proof
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use but definitely not smudge proof or waterproof. I’ve stopped using it because it creates smudge lines after wearing it for a couple of ours
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Super smudge proof.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe allergies and thusvam prone to rubbing my eyes. I tried many liners but always ended up with a black eye. This linerwas supeb, stayed put even on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tulika Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Made it through the night
customer_reviews.text: Woke up from a drunk night out with eyeliner still intact. Very impressed! Also it goes on super easily.
customer_reviews.author: Just what it looks like

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, good color.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly water resistant, but it will run a bit. Really easy to use, nicely opaque and black. Looks good, and comes off very easy with an oil wash. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Berger

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars bc it sticks to my eyelids and smudges. But it is easy to apply and very black in color. Just wish it would not smudge so much.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Bad applicator
customer_reviews.text: I loved this eyeliner the first few times I used it. Since then the applicator tip has come apart and there are strands pointing in all different directions. Now when you try to apply eyeliner you no longer get a straight line, you get a big mess. A sponge type applicator tip would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Beware it SMUDGES.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin, but a good primer can easily fix that however this eyeliner would simply not stay on. It smudges a lot and was transferring into my contacts (never had an eyeliner do that before) It also isn’t as dark as the NYX liquid eyeliner I usually use great dupe for Stila/Kat Von D.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant Not Proof
customer_reviews.text: Okay but not for an all day look that stays.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: "AWESOME"👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and is waterproof. I do Aquatic classes 3 days a week. No, runny eyes great product. Ye, I refer.
customer_reviews.author: Omogemama

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic!
customer_reviews.text: Since I made the eyeliner change, my eyes aren't watering nearly as much! I love the fine tip!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have even fallen a sleep in it and no smudges!
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: Smudge-proof
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. It's especially great for working out because it doesn't smudge at all.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, less money
customer_reviews.text: Equal in quality to the similar Clinique liner for less money.
customer_reviews.author: GA Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: It took me years to find one this amazing! It is so easy to use and goes on so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harding

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: No more allergic reactions. Super gently and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye liner but it's kinda of thick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smudge proof and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this liquid eyeliner! It dries almost instantly and it doesn’t budge! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because my first package never arrived however they took care of it and shipped out another one which I received 2 days later. Overall it’s a great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like eyeliner for it’s ease, it stays on all day without flaking off & value.
customer_reviews.author: Norma z Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I will purchase from now on. The eyeliner stays put even after I wash my face. It won't come off until I an eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.author: Jean Higbee

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The felt tip start to fall apart within two weeks and started to become dry.. but mine might've just been defective.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.poopybuttholeth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last more than 5 mins
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t even last for 5 mins, I am not sure how neutrogena could make such a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Swaranga

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to apply, thin sharp lines, waterproof, stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Cusumano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, but not waterproof or smudge-proof
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the eyeliner did not stay put very well. And it wasn't terribly water-resistant. I do really like the applicator. It's very simple to use and definitely one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Best liquid eyeliner I’ve ever used! Doesn’t run, smudge or stay wet. Dries quickly with a super easy glide and great price! I’ve gotten so many compliments since wearing it. I’ll be restocking soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner works amazingly! It even applies well on glittery eyeshadow. Plus the water resistance is pretty good. I forgot to take it off and I was going swimming and it didn't smear, it just kind of faded away.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Reliance and Removal
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner stays put through a lot of water and wear. But what I've noticed that is really special is that unlike other waterproof eyeliner it will not get kind of flaky after long wear. It also easier to take off with makeup remover at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: Smudge proof and stays on all day. My go to eyeliner now!
customer_reviews.author: Denielle

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good eye deliner. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CONELI B.

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: Goes on so smoothly! I’ve used this a few times and it works so well. Doesn’t smudge, and the color is great.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It stays put all day in the heat. First eyeliner I’ve found that does what it says. Intense color too.
customer_reviews.author: W.M

customer_reviews.title: Cat eyes on fleek
customer_reviews.text: I like how skinny the liner is when applied and its not really water resistant however i do notice it doesnt smudge or if you wet it -wipes completely off.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbygale

customer_reviews.title: Really good.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many liners but so far this one is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner EVER
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is literally amazing. I have such a hard time finding an eyeliner “pen” that I like. It’s very thin point. Great for an exact shape! 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Guianen

customer_reviews.title: Thick or thin
customer_reviews.text: A thick or thin line...you can have it with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smudges a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it cause no irritations like other all chemical based liners but honestly ZERO hold. Smudge in couple of hours. Makes no point to wear it for 9 to 5 work.
customer_reviews.author: Gazal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Thin head and smooth line. It's Water resistance is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Neda B

customer_reviews.title: It's all n more great product definently a must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great water proof no smugg no color running great in rain no worries ,crying on a movie no worries all good.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheap Liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner even more than designer brand liners I have used. It goes easy on, stays on, and looks great. It is also not a pain to remove. It is super easy to make nice sharp points if you like winged eyeliner
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The tip has some mechanisms that keeps the eyeliner on the tip so it doesn't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Went on super clean .. stayed on all night with no smudges .. gives great definition
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best eye liner I have ever used. Side thought : If only I had time machine. Hahahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Jeet Parminder

customer_reviews.title: Not smudge-proof!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smudge-proof?! No! Within 4 hours it gets smudged and I didn't even get it wet or touch it at all. I was in school doing nothing active at all and it smudges on my eye lids! I would not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Precision Liquid Eyeliner with Honey & Coconut, Hypoallergenic, Smudge- & Water-Resistant Eyeliner Makeup for Precise Application, Jet Black, 0.013 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Water-resistant, liquid eyeline that allows for precise application. Formulated with Honey and Coconut, designed to resist smudging. Hypoallergenic.
feature_bullets: Neutrogena Precision Liquid Eyeliner in Jet Black is highly pigmented, and water resistant for solid, defined lash lines that won't crack or melt
Precise eyeliner smoothly glides on quick and easy, offering effortless application of sharp, clean, dramatic lines
Formulated with natural honey and coconut, the smudge resistant eyeliner is quick drying and long lasting so it doesn't fade or flake
This black eye makeup is also hypoallergenic and gentle on sensitive eyes for comfortable application and lines that won't run
The easy to use applicator of this liquid eyeliner does not fray and provides an even line in just one stroke

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
